1. assimp
svn co http://assimp.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/assimp/trunk assimp
you should add 'include_directories(../include/BoostWorkaround) ' when you working on MacOSX; also, install the libboost-math is necessary
2. google-glog
code.google.com/p/google-glog/download/list
3. CGAL
www.cgal.org
4. google-test

5. QGLViewer
www.qglviewer.org
6. google-gflags
http://code.google.com/p/google-gflags/
